name: Poster Tags
description: Add quality, 4K, HD, HDR, Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, audio language flags, IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes badges to library item posters. Optional live preview and auto-apply on library scan.
overview: Embed tags (4K, HD, HDR, Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, ratings, custom tag) onto library posters.

versions.changelog: Diagnostics: log manifest resource names; try fallback resource name if main not found.
Settings page: full HTML document for iframe so Settings button shows form.
Settings page fix (HTML fragment). Resolution, HDR, premium audio, ratings, custom tag, live preview, auto-apply on scan.
Initial release. Resolution, HDR, premium audio, ratings, custom tag, live preview, auto-apply on scan.
